Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Mission Critical
b) Defect Observed: Weapon release circuit malfunction. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Design limitation in component load capacity under extreme conditions
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Ammunition Feed component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Conduct fleet-wide inspection campaign
d) Attributable Code: U - Lapses on the part of User
Remarks: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol.
Date: 08/12/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy
